history.proof: intros i Hprec. destruct i. - exists O. sfirstorder depth: 3. - hauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment Hprec : prec [::] Unable to unify "Some 0" with "f [::]".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment n : nat i : Exports.input Hprec : prec (n :: i) Unable to unify "Some 0" with "f (n :: i)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros i Hprec. destruct i. - exists O. reflexivity. - exists O. reflexivity. - destruct i as [|x [|y t]]. + simpl in Hprec. discriminate. + exists (x + y). reflexivity.
